title: Jumbo-Visma Bets on Military Officers and Schoolkids in Hunt for Its Next Grand Tour Winners
content:
Jumbo-Visma signs former air force officer, secures 16-year-old sensation for future contract in quest for continued dominance.

Read the full article at Jumbo-Visma Bets on Military Officers and Schoolkids in Hunt for Its Next Grand Tour Winners on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
